Hi I'm Peter Jefferys

Videogames and computers have always played a large part in my life. I've played a lot of games while growing up and became interested in how they work. I started my career in IT as a Database Developer while attending a local community college. I used what earned to transferred to Full Sail to earn my bachelors in Game Development.

Skills

My bachelors in Game Development gave me the education and training I need to create and debug game engines and gameplay systems mainly in C++ and C#.
